title: The "Blog" of "Unnecessary" quotation marks
content:
[![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062109im_/http:/bp0.blogger.com/_-dk1axrNmqU/Rw4-p1k9VwI/AAAAAAAABOo/AgJR1cp2j1Y/s400/lunches.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062109/http:/twitter.com/splorp)

I follow [Splorp's Twitter stream](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062109/http:/twitter.com/splorp) and found [this “gem” of a “blog.”](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062109/http:/quotation-marks.blogspot.com/)

**“Enjoy”**
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content: There is almost infinite material for such a thing. Don’t go and look unless you can take the pain. Awwwch!

Thanks for the “tip”!  
Great blog, but do the dumb quotes in the header drive anyone else crazy?
